channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 18:22 The threat of artobrats to Pokrovskaya territorial community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Nikopol district
item.description: 🟡 18:22 The threat of artobrats to Pokrovskaya territorial community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Nikopol district#Pokrovskay This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
